Imperial is a good measurement system for human UX. For the vast majority of human measurements, imperial has you saying numbers <10-12 which is friendly and convenient. “They are 6 ft” 🙂 vs “they are 182 centimeters” 🤮. Is anyone honestly out here saying “pls pour me a deciliter”? good grief
